name: Red Gradient dAmn
description:
- This will only work with firefox 3.6 -

Yeah. It changes dAmn to look red/pinkish and black. Good for going with colours, I guess.


The uncoloured version (slightly different) can be found here: http://i-haet-mushrooms.deviantart.com/art/dAmn-v7-update-6-release-1-164747483

K. Thx. Bai.
